Class ManagerInventory

java.lang.Object
ManagerInventory
public class ManagerInventory extends Object
This class is used to display the inventory from the manager dashboard, can be used to add, delete, or modify inventory items
Author:
Brayden Bailey

    • addInventoryItem

      private void addInventoryItem(String name, int quantity, boolean is_topping)
      Internal method to add inventory item to SQL database, updates page after adding
      Parameters:
      name - Name of inventory item
      quantity - Total quantity of inventory item
      is_topping - Option for categorizing as a topping ingredient

    • deleteInventoryItem

      private void deleteInventoryItem(String name)

      Parameters:
      name - Name of inventory item

      quantity - total new quantity
